Improvements.Improvement: Use method references instead of lambda expressions
Improvements.Description: Method references are more readable and efficient than lambda expressions. Instead of using a lambda expression to add parameters to the path, a method reference can be used.

Improvements.Improvement: Extract repeated ApiResponse creation to a method
Improvements.Description: The creation of ApiResponse is repeated multiple times with slight variations which increases code duplication. This can be avoided by creating a method that returns an ApiResponse instance based on parameters.

Improvements.Improvement: Extract repeated API operation creation to a method
Improvements.Description: The creation of API operations is repeated multiple times which leads to code duplication. This can be avoided by creating a method that returns an Operation instance based on parameters.

Improvements.Improvement: Use enhanced for loop instead of traditional for loop
Improvements.Description: Instead of using a traditional for loop to iterate over parameters, use an enhanced for loop.
